demo.name: brd2601b.demo.ml_blink
demo.label: AI/ML - Blink Demo for xG24

property.value: AI/ML - Blink Demo for xG24
Device\ Type|SoC MCU|32-bit\ MCU Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Capability|Machine\ Learning

demo.description: This application demonstrates a model trained to replicate a sine function. The model is continuously fed with values ranging from 0 to 2pi, and the output of the model is used to control the intensity of an LED.

demo.name: brd2601b.demo.ml_magic_wand
demo.label: AI/ML - Magic Wand Demo for xG24

property.value: AI/ML - Magic Wand Demo for xG24
Device\ Type|SoC MCU|32-bit\ MCU Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Capability|Machine\ Learning

demo.description: This application demonstrates a model trained to recognize various hand gestures with an accelerometer. The detected gestures are printed to the serial port.

demo.name: brd2601b.demo.ml_model_profiler
demo.label: AI/ML - Model Profiler Demo for xG24

property.value: AI/ML - Model Profiler Demo for xG24
Device\ Type|SoC MCU|32-bit\ MCU Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Capability|Machine\ Learning

demo.description: This application profiles a ML model. The ML model is loaded as a byte array which is generated from a Tensorflow tflite model file. Profiling is performed by running one inference with the model.

demo.name: brd2601b.demo.ml_voice_control_light
demo.label: AI/ML - Voice Control Light Demo for xG24

property.value: AI/ML - Voice Control Light Demo for xG24
Device\ Type|SoC MCU|32-bit\ MCU Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Capability|Machine\ Learning

demo.description: This application uses TensorFlow Lite for Microcontrollers to detect the spoken words 'on' and 'off' from audio data recorded on the microphone in a Micrium OS kernel task. The detected keywords are used to control an LED on the board.

demo.name: brd2601b.demo.ml_audio_classifier
demo.label: AI/ML - Audio Classifier Demo for xG24

property.value: AI/ML - Audio Classifier Demo for xG24
Device\ Type|SoC MCU|32-bit\ MCU Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Capability|Machine\ Learning

demo.description: This application uses TensorFlow Lite for Microcontrollers to classify audio data recorded on the microphone in a Micrium OS kernel task. The classification is used to control a LED on the board.

demo.name: brd2601b.demo.ml_image_classifier
demo.label: AI/ML - Image Classifier Demo for xG24

property.value: AI/ML - Image Classifier Demo for xG24
Device\ Type|SoC MCU|32-bit\ MCU Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Capability|Machine\ Learning

demo.description: This application uses TensorFlow Lite for Microcontrollers to run image classification machine learning models to classify hand gestures from image data captured from external camera. The detection is visualized using the LED's on the board and the classification results are written to the VCOM serial port.

demo.name: brd2601b.demo.ml_zigbee_z3_switch_with_voice
demo.label: AI/ML - Zigbee 3.0 Switch with Voice for xG24

property.value: AI/ML - Zigbee 3.0 Switch with Voice for xG24
Device\ Type|SoC MCU|32-bit\ MCU Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Capability|Machine\ Learning

demo.description:
Zigbee 3.0 provides a foundation of commissioning and network management mechanisms to be used in all Zigbee applications. The sample scenario presented here demonstrates the flexibility that the Zigbee 3.0 specification provides to applications. It also acts as an excellent starting point for users wishing to build their own Zigbee 3.0 applications.
Voice recognition has been added to the Switch with Voice scenario application, where TensorFlow Lite Micro is used to detect spoken keywords in audio recorded from the board's microphone. Once the switch has finished finding and binding, the user can turn on or off the light by speaking the words "on" or "off" into the microphone.

Device\ Type|SoC MCU|32-bit\ MCU Project\ Difficulty|Advanced Capability|Machine\ Learning

Zigbee 3.0 provides a foundation of commissioning and network management mechanisms to be used in all Zigbee applications. The sample scenario presented here demonstrates the flexibility that the Zigbee 3.0 specification provides to applications.
